Class InfoWindowAdapterButtoned

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mk4droid.IMC_Core.InfoWindowAdapterButtoned
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.google.android.gms.maps.GoogleMap.InfoWindowAdapter

    public class InfoWindowAdapterButtoned
extends Object
implements com.google.android.gms.maps.GoogleMap.InfoWindowAdapter
    This class creates a custom Info window that has a title, a snippet and an icon.
    Author:
    Dimitrios Ververidis for the Multimedia Group (http://mklab.iti.gr).
